p: The datasets zika_girardot_2015 and zika_sanandres_2015 used in the second example are also from the outbreaks package. These datasets describe the daily incidence of Zika virus disease (ZVD) in, respectively, Girardot and San Andres Island, Colombia from September 2015 to January 2016. For details on these datasets, please refer to Rojas et al. (2016) .
